about.title: Your Business Headquarters
about.description: M25 is Tbilisi's exclusive business address with refined offices, wellness & gourmet dining.
about.mission: Our mission is to create a new business culture where excellence and well-being come together.

offices.title: Your Exclusive Workspace
offices.description: Fully equipped private offices designed for focused work and professional excellence.

coworking.title: Collaborate and Connect
coworking.description: Flexible workspace solutions perfect for freelancers, startups, and remote teams.

flexibleMemberships.title: Flexible Memberships
flexibleMemberships.description: Select daily, weekly, or monthly plans to suit your schedule.

refreshments.title: Complimentary Refreshments
refreshments.description: Enjoy unlimited coffee and tea throughout the day.

phoneBooths.title: Phone Booths
phoneBooths.description: Step into soundproof spaces for focused calls.

meetingRoom.title: Meeting Room
meetingRoom.description: Book private space for meetings or brainstorming.

wellnessCenter.title: Wellness Center
wellnessCenter.description: Make the most of our premium gym and sauna with modern equipment.

internet.title: High-Speed Internet
internet.description: Access reliable fibreoptic connection for smooth online work.

virtual.title: Professional Business Address
virtual.description: Establish your business presence in Batumi with our virtual office solutions.

benefits.callHandling: Professional call handling under your company name
benefits.preferentialRates: Preferential rates for meeting rooms & co-working spaces
benefits.adminSupport: Hands-on administrative support for day to day business needs

meetingRooms.title: Professional Meeting Spaces
meetingRooms.description: Fully equipped meeting rooms for productive discussions and presentations.

amenities.title: Premium Facilities for Your Success
amenities.description: Everything you need to run your business efficiently and comfortably.

gallery.title: Take a Virtual Tour
gallery.description: Explore our modern workspace through our gallery.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: The dedicated professionals behind M25 Business Center.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions? We're here to help. Reach out to us today.

footer.description: Premium business center in the heart of Batumi, offering world-class office solutions.

compact.name: Compact
compact.description: Tailored for executives or small teams seeking privacy and focus. Includes kitchenette and meeting rooms access.

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Designed for dynamic teams with multiple workstations, kitchenette, access to meeting rooms and a scenic terrace.

grand.name: Grand
grand.description: Full-floor exclusivity for larger enterprises, featuring private amenities, multiple workstations, access to meeting rooms and wellness center.

cafe.title: Café
cafe.description: A stylish ground-floor café offering a relaxed and healthy dining experience.

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.description: An elegant top-floor venue for executive dinners and networking events.

gym.title: Gym
gym.description: A premium fitness space equipped for high-performance workouts.

spa.title: Spa
spa.description: A calm retreat to rejuvenate & restore balance.

shota-rustaveli.name: Shota Rustaveli
shota-rustaveli.description: Our largest conference room, perfect for company-wide meetings, presentations, and large gatherings.

napoleon-bonaparte.name: Napoleon Bonaparte
napoleon-bonaparte.description: An intimate space designed for board meetings, team sessions, and executive gatherings.

vakhtang-gorgasali.name: Vakhtang Gorgasali
vakhtang-gorgasali.description: A private setting for small group meetings, interviews, and confidential discussions.

victor-hugo.name: Victor Hugo
victor-hugo.description: Ideal for focused team discussions, project planning, and creative brainstorming.

teamBios.mariam: Responsible for shaping the company's financial strategy and ensuring sustainable growth. She combines strategic vision with strong analytical expertise to drive performance and long-term value.
teamBios.nina: Your primary contact for all leasing enquiries. She ensures every detail from viewing to contracting is managed with a personal, precise, and professional approach.
teamBios.ani: Responsible for the commercial strategy and brand development of M25 Business Center, Ani Mazanishvili builds and strengthens enduring relationships with our valued partners.
teamBios.jeremy: Jeremy Guilbert ensures that every technical and operational aspect of the M25 Business Center runs flawlessly for our clients.
teamBios.julietta: Julietta Shushanian oversees financial operations of M25 Business Center, ensuring accuracy, transparency, and efficiency across every transaction.
